The note even explains why Nokia concentrating on their Meego platform or switching to Android would be bad ideas. The whole Nokia using Windows Phone 7 rumor thing reminds me a lot of how fact follows fiction. Back in 2003-2007, people constantly talked about Apple creating a mobile phone. People were always creating fake mock-ups and pretending they might be real someday.

Micah Zenko , a political scientist at the Council on Foreign Relations, extensively researched U.S. planning for a military strike on Khurmal in 2002 and detailed it in his book Between Threats and War. He said in an interview that he was unaware that Donald Rumsfeld had advocated bombing the place while Powell was at the U.N. By that time, the Khurmal camp had been largely empty for months, Micah Zenko said
